name: Save the Princess (Ekafe)
description:
Just a gameplay prototype where you are in a game engine and you have to manage the game "Save the Princess" to finish it.

Made by a Game Design student and 3 brave people for whom this is the first experience in game development.

Credit :

  • Dautrey Baptiste
  • Driot Maxime
  • Labesse Théophile
  • Lamassoure Esther
